title: Error in method - explain why will not compile

content.question: Which of the following best explains why the  computeArea  method will not compile?

choices.label: Local variables declared inside a method cannot be declared as  public  or  private.
Local variables declared inside a method must all be  private.
Local variables declared inside a method must all be  public.
Local variables used inside a method must be declared before the method header.

content.answer: Local variables declared inside a method cannot be declared as  public  or  private.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
